name: Save the Bird!
description:
You are an experimental military drone. Captivated by the beauty of a passing bird, you vow to protect it from the threats surrounding it -- including your former comrades, who have realised you've gone AWOL and are chasing you down. Keep the bird (and yourself) alive for as long as you can!

Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46, with assistance from @alanxoc3.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Shoot
  • X: Call the bird to you
